channel.title: Minor Error
channel.description:
I've been trying to add specials to my server, it's all gone in nicely and I fixed a few errors, now I get this last one:
client.java:23173: ';' expected method resetBar(); ^ 1 error
Really strange, I tryied messing around with it and still didn't get a good outcome. Anyone got any ideas?

item.title: Minor Error
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

You’re not supposed to have method infront of it … it should look like …

specBar -= 3; resetBar(); } else { sendMessage("You need more special energy to do that"); resetBar(); } return true; } else {

That’s fine. The reason you’re getting the other errors is because you don’t have resetBar() declared. Then just remove boolean before the GoOn = true;

Read full topic

item.title: Minor Error
item.dc:creator: @KiIIer KiIIer
item.description:
@KiIIer wrote:

[quote=“cccrrraaazzziii, post:12, topic:135798”]I tried taking the ‘Method’ out before and I only get this:

[quote]client.java:23173: cannot find symbol
symbol : method resetBar()
location: class client
resetBar();
^
client.java:23176: cannot find symbol
symbol : method resetBar()
location: class client
resetBar();
^
client.java:24617: GoOn is already defined in CheckForSkillUse3(int,int)
boolean GoOn = true;
^
client.java:24657: GoOn is already defined in CheckForSkillUse3(int,int)
boolean GoOn = true;
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
4 errors
Press any key to continue . . .
[/quote]

Errors hate me.[/quote]

You do not have a method (public void resetBar() { or public boolean resetBar() { or public int resetBar() {) in client.java so therefore you cannot use that method.

You added GoOn two extra times in “CheckForSkillUse3(int, int){”

Read full topic

and 8ball, that’s the line it’s on, not the name of the code he has to search for.
